newsitem.title: CANADA: Shell Canada lowers posted oil prices.
newsitem.headline: Shell Canada lowers posted oil prices.

text.p: Shell Canada Ltd said on Tuesday it lowered the price it would pay for some grades of crude oil by C$1.00/cubic metre or C$0.16/barrel, effective immediately.
The new prices were listed as follows:
Edmonton light sweet C$159.00/cubic metre, or C$25.28/barrel
Cromer light sour C$149.00/cubic metre, or C$23.69/barrel
Hardisty medium C$134.00/cubic metre, or C$21.30/barrel
Midale at Cromer C$133.00/cubic metre, or C$21.15/barrel
